select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName, round(case when sum(IFNULL(t2.cnt,0))=0 then 0 else sum(IFNULL(t2.outInDrugCount,0))/sum(t2.cnt) * 100*1.00 end,2) count
from ( select t.hospital hospital, IFNULL(sum(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(Inp),0) cnt, IFNULL(sum(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(Inp_drug),0) outInDrugCount from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 left join ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName, round(case when IFNULL(t2.cnt,0)=0 then 0 else IFNULL(t2.outInDrugCount,0)/t2.cnt * 100*1.00 end,2) count
from ( select t.hospital hospital, IFNULL(sum(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(Inp),0) cnt, IFNULL(sum(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(Inp_drug),0) outInDrugCount from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 left join ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.parent_item_code = #{parentId} and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0)count from ( select sd.hospital||'-'||sd.dept_code||'-'||sd.emp_no as itemCode,sd.name as itemName from dc.staff_dict sd where sd.hospital=#{hspId} and sd.dept_code=#{deptCode} ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code||'-'||t.doctor itemCode,count(*)cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital=#{hspId} and t.dept_code=#{deptCode} and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code||'-'||t.doctor ) t2 on t1.itemCode=t2.itemCode order by ifnull(t2.cnt,0) desc

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select ROUND(CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (IFNULL(SUM(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp_drug), 0)) / (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp),0)) * 100* 1.00 END,2) thisYear from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= #{startDate} and t.visit_date < #{endDate} and hospital=hsp.id) countNew, (select ROUND(CASE WHEN (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp), 0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (IFNULL(SUM(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp_drug), 0)) / (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp),0)) * 100* 1.00 END,2) agoYear from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= concat(cast(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y')- 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and t.visit_date <= concat(cast(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and hospital=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where hsp.id in

select t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.count,0) count from ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in group by t.charge_type) t1 left join ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.charge_type) t2 on t1.itemName = t2.itemName order by t1.itemName

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t2.dateData dateData, round(case when IFNULL(t2.cnt,0)=0 then 0 else IFNULL(t2.outInDrug,0)/t2.cnt * 100 * 1.00 end,2) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id in ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, date_format(t.VISIT_DATE,#{dateFormater}) dateData, IFNULL(sum(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(Inp),0) cnt, IFNULL(sum(Inp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(Outp_drug),0) outInDrug from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in AND visit_date >= #{startDate} AND visit_date < #{endDate} group by t.hospital,dateData ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select ROUND(CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (IFNULL(SUM(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp_drug), 0)) / (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp),0)) * 100* 1.00 END,2) thisYear from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= #{startDate} and t.visit_date < #{endDate} and hospital=hsp.id) countNew, (select ROUND(CASE WHEN (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp), 0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (IFNULL(SUM(Outp_drug),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp_drug), 0)) / (IFNULL(SUM(Outp),0)+IFNULL(sum(inp),0)) * 100* 1.00 END,2) agoYear from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= concat(cast(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y')- 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and t.visit_date <= concat(cast(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and hospital=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where LENGTH(hsp.id)=10 and hsp.comm_config_unitgrade_id=(select comm_config_unitgrade_id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where item_Name=#{hspName});
